content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --VAMT
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --TRTV
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000100
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when --VAMT is not empty, but --TRTV is empty.
Outcome:
  Message: Missing --TRTV value, when --VAMT value is populated.
  Output Variables:
    - --TRTV
    - --VAMT
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0423
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: A carrier or inert medium in which a medicinally active
                  agent is administered.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --TRTV
                Section: Interventions
              - Cited Guidance: Amount of the prepared product (treatment plus vehicle)
                  administered.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --VAMT
                Section: Interventions
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - INTERVENTIONS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when --VAMT is not empty, but --TRTV is empty.

Outcome.Message: Missing --TRTV value, when --VAMT value is populated.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: A carrier or inert medium in which a medicinally active agent is administered.
Amount of the prepared product (treatment plus vehicle) administered.
